storyInfo: The lost Bison manages to trace a small road back to the park with Sora's help, where he finds the members of Penguin Logistics interrogating the Mafia. However, a slip of the hand results in a hostage getting blasted sky-high, and chaos erupts once more.

attributes.content: 7:59 PM \ Cloudy
Lungmen Aqueduct, Pier
Now don't go jumping onto any more boats! It's dangerous!
attributes.name: Stranger

attributes.content: Sorry, it's just, we were...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: By the way, you didn't happen to see a Sankta lady around here, did you?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: I didn't see anything. And I don't have time for this. These sweets are for the after party and are you gonna pay me if they turn up late... Oh?
attributes.name: Stranger

attributes.content: A S- Sankta...
attributes.name: Stranger

attributes.content: Ah! Mostim——
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Mostima? You know Mostima?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Sorry. I mistook you for someone else.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: (This lady sure looks familiar.)
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Ahem. Anyway, I'll let you off this time. But don't go doing anything that dangerous ever again.
attributes.name: Stranger

attributes.content: S- sorry. I didn't mean to trouble you.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Hm... Forte kid... there was something about a Forte kid... what was it...?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Oh!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Aaah! What are you doing?!
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: You had some candy on your horn.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Oh, really? I should probably give it back to...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: And looking at your horns reminded me of something! They're just like the Mountain Dash Logistics logo!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You're the little prince of MDL, aren't you?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Little... prince...?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Sora, ma'am, is this really the way back to Texas and the others?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Relax, I know what Texas is thinking at all times. I can see right into her head.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Oh.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: ...her voice has such a familiar quality to it, but I can't put my finger on it.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: 'Ma'am,' huh? Hehe, I never thought the day would come when young Messengers would be calling me that~ So what's your impression of everybody?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Impression?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: They're very... um... spirited people.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Ahahaha... I can guess what they must've put you through...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Oh, sorry!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Watch where you're going! Ptoo!
attributes.name: Child

attributes.content: That was clearly your fault——
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Who asked you? Mind your own business!
attributes.name: Child

attributes.content: You little brat!
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Don't worry about it. Let him go.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But he just swiped your wallet——
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Hehe, he sure did. But that wallet just had some pumpkin candies inside. See? This is the real one~
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You familiar with the old expression 'trick or treat'?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: He was here just to make trouble, and today's not even... why would you have something like that?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: You may not be able to tell at first glance, but Lungmen's been through a lot lately.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Sauin candles aren't bright enough to light up all the dark corners of this city, and those kids don't exactly have it easy.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But hey, it's just something I came up with. Not bad, huh?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: What if he grabbed my wallet instead...?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Should be right up ahead.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Isn't this... the park from before? Did we just make a big circle?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: See? Here they are.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Mmmh! Mmff mff!
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Listen, if you don't talk, I'm gonna have to light this fuse.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Yer lips better start flappin', kiddo. These fireworks'll blow ya sky high.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: ...You forgot to take the tape off his mouth.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Oh, right. Haha.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You crazy broads! Do you have any idea who we are?
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: ...the Siracusan Mafia.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Urk, T- Texas...? Don't think we're scared of you!
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Oh we know you're not scared. Why else would you blow up all the boss's collectibles. A bomb in a candy box, though? That's kids' stuff.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: ...what are you talking about?
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I don't know nothin' about no candy box. But if our capo did up a bomb, you'd all be in pieces—— Mmmf! Mmmh!
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: This guy sure is full of himself. Let's blast him.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Patience, Exusiai. Let him talk.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: *Gasp*——Hah. Ain't you the least bit curious why Lungmen's lettin' us get away with all this?
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Not really. As long as we go down to the station once a month to pay our property damage fines, they pretty much let us do whatever too.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Gah...
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: C'mon, Exu, let the feller say his piece.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Just look at you broads...!
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: We got the big man's OK to do whatever we want to Penguin Logistics, right from the real power in Lungmen. You know what that means, don't you?
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: We're a legitimate logistics business? And a pretty good one at that?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Then why do we always end up... You know what? Forget it.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Who's 'the big man' you're talking about?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: It sounds really pretentious. Super gross.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Don't play dumb! The Rat King's——
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Hey! Texas! And the rest!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Oh, Sora! What's up~
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: How about that. She wrangled Bison too.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Hehe, I ran into this lost little calf on my way over, I thought I'd bring him along.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Um... what are you doing? And where's Mr. Emperor?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: The boss went somewhere to do something.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You didn't run into anyone else, Sora?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Hm? I don't... think... so.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Huh? Do I have something on my face?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: N- no. Anyway, Bison filled me in on the whole story. Where do we go from here?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: First we get some more answers from our little buddy, then we formulate an appropriate... response.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Wait, Exusiai, do you mean...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: I actually ran into Mostima back there. But then I lost her.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Erm, I mean, after we shook the mobsters, she——
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: ...don't worry about her. That's just how she is. Vanishing years at a time.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: ...years?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Tell ya the truth, I barely seen heads or tails of her since they hired me.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Ahaha, let's not get Exusiai too riled up...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: This is all very... unorthodox.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: She's a special kind of Messenger.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Contractually, she works for the boss, but more often Laterano has her——
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: ——Exusiai, watch your match.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Huh? Oops.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: MMMMH! MMF——!!
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Darn it, looks like we're outta time. But that's the way the cookie crumbles.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: MMMMMNG!!!!!
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Heyo, that sounded like Fronzo! And it didn't sound good!
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Let's get over there!
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: So they really can send a person flying. These fireworks are something else.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: We've got company. Six and three o'clock.
attributes.name: Texas
